no-client: Client does not exist with this credentials
used-email-with-roles: Email is already exists with the same role
rewf-auto-outgoing: Outgoing action in REWF can not be auto
running-request: Request has already a running instance
self-message: You can not send a message to yourself
first-name-minimum: First name should have at least 3 characters
first-name-maximum: First name should have at most 30 characters
last-name-minimum: Last name should have at least 3 characters
last-name-maximum: Last name should have at most 30 characters
middle-name-minimum: Middle name should have at least 3 characters
middle-name-maximum: Middle name should have at most 30 characters
username-minimum: Username should have at least 2 characters
username-maximum: Username should have at most 30 characters
password-minimum: Password should have at least 8 characters
password-maximum: Password should have at most 50 characters
password-match: Password must have at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and one digit
